item.title: Buy Our ‘Destroy AI’ T-Shirt
item.content:encoded:
https://aftermath.site/buy-destroy-ai-shirt-aftermath-kim-hu

We've added a new t-shirt to our merch store today. Our Destroy AI tee, illustrated for Aftermath by artist Kim Hu, is available now in two colours.

Wanna support human workers and human artists? Buy a shirt!

How Clair Obscur’s Composer Created An Incredible Soundtrack

Lorien Testard dropped eight hours of straight heat for those who come after

Bring Back Those Long-Ass Game Show Mics

The long microphone used Bob Barker on the Price is Right and Gene Rayburn on Match Game haven't been produced in years. It's time they came back.
